entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , West Vancouver
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:14 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: West Vancouver 09:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: 7.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 6.9°C
Wind: E 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 50 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia late this morning and this afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
